info.name: Deluxe Hotel Tirana
info.description: Hotel Deluxe is set in Tirana
info.longDescription:
Hotel Deluxe is set in Tirana, 1.6 mi from Skenderberg Square. The 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with a private bathroom and free WiFi. The property has a restaurant and a garden. Sky Tower is 1.6 mi away.

All rooms at the hotel are fitted with a seating area and a flat-screen TV. The rooms include a desk. A continental breakfast is served every morning at the property.

Speaking Greek, English and Italian at the 24-hour front desk, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical information on the area.

National Arts Gallery is 1.6 mi from Hotel Deluxe. The nearest airport is Tirana Airport, 9.9 mi from the property.
